verses.roman:
ei eka, śuna āra lobhera prakāra
sva-mādhurya dekhi' kṛṣṇa karena vicāra

synonyms: ei—this; eka—one; śuna—please hear; āra—another; lobhera—of eager desire; prakāra—type; sva-mādhurya—own sweetness; dekhi'-seeing; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; karena—does; vicāra—consideration.
translation: That is one desire. Now please hear of another. Seeing His own beauty, Lord Kṛṣṇa began to consider.
